name: Being Ubuntu Foundation
briefDescription: Being Ubuntu Foundation is a non-profitable organization registered under Public Trust Act in August 2013. Our foundation would work for conservation of renewable energy, preservation of natural water resources and ecological sanitation. Our area of work would include include rain water harvesting, harvesting of solar energy, wind energy and providing sanitation cover and economic opportunity.Kindly take sometime to visit our w ebsite www.beingubuntufoundation.org and feel free to mail us at viralc@sify.com.
